reviewtext: Added a second computer to our HDHomerun Media Center in the Den, and this made it easy.  It took 20 minutes from the time I started hooking up the Netgear ProSafe until it was complete.  Both computers were already up and running before I started.  One was on a cat5 cable and the other one on a USB WiFi stick.  Now they are both hard wired to the router using this switch.
